text: Novosphingobium lindaniclasticum is a Gram-negative, aerobic, rod-shaped, non- spore-forming and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Novosphingobium which has been isolated from a hexachlorocyclohexane dumpsite in Lucknow in India. Novosphingobium lindaniclasticum has the ability to degrade hexachlorocyclohexane. == References == Category:Bacteria described in 2013 Category:Sphingomonadales
title: Novosphingobium lindaniclasticum
